descr: Developed by Amazon
Developed by Amazon
AutoMate is a codeless Windows only Deployment and management tool.
Developed by IBM
Application LIfecycle ENablement for Cloud
Ansible is a radically simple IT automation engine that automates cloud provisioning, configuration management, application deployment, intra-service orchestration, and many other IT needs. [@AnsHow]
ARIA is an agile reference implementation of automation based on OASIS TOSCA Specification [@Aria]
Supported by Cloudsoft [@Cloudsoft]
CFEngine is a distributed system for managing and monitoring computers across an IT network [@CFengGuide]
Chef is an automation platform that transforms infrastructure into code.
Developed by Cinovo
CloudFoundry is a platform as a service, it is backed by the Cloud Foundry Foundation and is open source. [@CF]
Cloudify is an open source TOSCA based cloud orchestration software platform [@ClfyAU]
Commando is a distributed web based SSH platform for managing servers [@Commando]
Docker is an open source containerization platform.
Fabric is a simple Python library and command-line tool for streamlining the use of SSH for application deployment or systems administration tasks [@Fabric]
fleet ties together systemd and etcd into a simple distributed init system [@FleetGit]
Foreman is a life cycle management tool for physical and virtual servers and depends on Puppet [@ForeInst]
Heat is a Service for Application Lifecycle Management in an Openstack enviroment.
Juju is an application and service modelling tool that enables you to quickly model, configure, deploy and manage applications in the cloud with only a few commands [@Juju]
Kubernetes is an open-source system for automating deployment, scaling, and management of containerized applications. [@Kubernetes]
MaestroNG is an orchestrator of Docker-based, multi hosts enviroments.

Apache Mesos abstracts away from (physical or virtual) machines, adding an another layer of abstraction between applications and the machines This enables fault-tolerant and elastic distributed systems to easily built and run effectively [@Mesos]
Pallet is platform for agile and programmatic automation of infrastructure in the cloud, on server racks or directly on virtual machines [@Pallet]
Picassio is a PowerShell v3.0+ automated provisioning/deployment tool, which uses a single JSON file to determine what commands to execute [@Picass]
Developed by Puppet-Labs
An open source platform for Adaptive Multi-cloud Management of Service-based application.
Container scheduling and management, focused on operational simplicity
